meanings: leave one's entire life to someone
leave one's entire life to someone

vlive.korean: 평생... For the rest of your life... 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep #98. 키스 더 아이돌라디오 (w. 슈퍼주니어 려욱)
vlive.english: For the rest of your life...

vlive.korean: [손동표평생사랑해 - 동표야 키 컸어?] 키 컸... [Did you grow up taller?] Height... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [손동표] 올림포스에 에로스가 있다면 지구엔 사랑둥이 동표가 있거든요💘 (Dongpyo singing number song)
난 평생 5등급 인생을 살게 될까...? does that mean that I would live a 5th-grade life? 듣기 View video tvN D : 내신등급이 내 인생의 등급일까? [언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉] Ep.1
vlive.english: does that mean that I would live a 5th-grade life?

vlive.korean: [아니 나 진짜 하빵한테 평생 게임 오버야] 게임 오버! [My life is over for you, HAYOUNG] Game over! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Apink] 상큼발랄 인간비타민 하빵이의 큐티를 픽♡업♡ 👏👏 (HAYOUNG talking about animation&snack of memory)
vlive.english: [My life is over for you, HAYOUNG] Game over!

vlive.korean: 계속됩니다 - 평생 - 평생? It will go on forever. - Forever? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 호화롭게 기습라이브 시작🐶⭐️
vlive.english: It will go on forever. - Forever?

examples.korean: He spent his life sponging off his relatives. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 친척들에게 빌붙어서 평생을 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He spent his life sponging off his relatives. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was the most agonizing decision of her life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 그녀 평생 가장 고통스러운 결정이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was the most agonizing decision of her life. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He spent his life popularizing natural history. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 박물학을 보급[대중화]하는 데 평생을 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He spent his life popularizing natural history. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The disease has left her with permanent lameness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 병으로 그녀는 평생 다리를 절게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The disease has left her with permanent lameness. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The experience left her scarred for life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 경험은 그녀의 마음에 평생 지워지지 않는 상처를 남겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The experience left her scarred for life. Add to Wordbook
